content: पितृ {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [पाति रक्षति, पा-तृच् नि°] {@--1@} A father; तेनास लोकः पितृमान् विनेत्रा <ls>R. 14. 23</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 24</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 67.</ls> --रौ (dual) Parents, father and mother; जगतः पितरौ वंदे पार्वतीपरमेश्वरौ <ls>R. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 117.</ls> --रः (<ab>pl.</ab>) {1} Fore-fathers, ancestors, fathers; <ls>Ś. 6. 24.</ls> {@--2@} Paternal ancestors taken collectively; <ls>Ms. 2. 151.</ls> {@--3@} The Manes; <ls>R. 2. 16</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 20</ls>; <ls>Bg. 10. 29</ls>: <ls>Ms. 3. 81</ls>; <ls n="Ms. 3.">192.</ls>
